title: WillyAp
author: WillyAp
content: After the latest implementations Litecoin is practically renewed. One of the few coins not going into wintersleep. So its Updated if your will. LTC2.0 : The perfect payment coin due to fast settlements, usually under 3 Minutes.  The MWEB Thread is over here https://litecointalk.io/t/mweb-progress-update-thread-2/53072/19 Quote from: davidFebruary & March 2023 Progress:v0.21.2.2 ReleaseWe released a new minor version of Litecoin Core (v0.21.2.2) in February which contained some important security fixes. If you haven’t upgraded yet, you can download it here:
